dmca.title: Beagles & Defamation?
dmca.body:
10/15/02
[Private],

I strongly suggest you remove the defamatory and derogatory remarks about 
B&B from your website.  You are interfering with our business and 
contractual relations and you got false and bad information.   Yet if you 
insist on republishing it, you are just as liable as the original wrongdoers.

You are way way off base and are setting yourself and all you have up for a 
lawsuit and serious trouble.

As a slight aside, how in the world can you continue to leave Dayzee here 
when you are saying what you have?  Sort of makes you look very bad doesn't 
it?

Most sincerely,

[Sender]
www.beaglesandbuddies.com

---
10/16/02
The fact that you have changed the language to "I fear and suspect...." 
does not take away the printed hard copy that I have with the outrageous 
language you first used.   And you are still reporting false, slanderous, 
libelous information.

I have no problem whatsoever following up on this.  Kelly and Christy may 
not have a pot to piss in, but B&B would love to have your retirement, new 
home and everything else that would be appropriate punitive damages as a 
result of your repeating lies and hurtful information.

And you still have no problem with us taking care of Dayzee - be wary indeed!

You fear and suspect money is misused; dogs, volunteers and employees are 
mentally and physically abused and important information is withheld from 
customers.  The right decent thing to do is tell me exactly what your 
suspicions and fears are and I will address them to you.  To stoop to the 
very low level of publishing such a vague smear is so beneath you 
Sonya.  Please have the courage of your convictions and face this squarely 
with me.

I certainly intend to squarely face it in whatever forum will grant relief.

Sincerely,

[Sender]
www.beaglesandbuddies.com


-------
10/18/02
A review of the black letter law informs me that B&B doesn't even have to 
show that your remarks damaged us.  To accuse of a crime is slander per se 
and subject to punitive damages.

You might want to get some legal advice.  B&B will pursue this to the 
fullest extent of the law.

[Sender]
www.beaglesandbuddies.com

*****************************************************************************

These emails were sent in regards to a statement made on my website,
"10/7/02 I will no longer be a volunteer member of Beagles and
Buddies. Sad, but I fear and suspect that the organization
has been using donation funds improperly, with-holding
important information from customers, mentally and
physically abusing dogs, employees and volunteers alike.

If you plan on donating money or adopting a dog, I would be
wary of them."
